verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:33
verses.text: And these are the singers, chief of the fathers of the Levites, who remaining in the chambers were free: for they were employed in that work day and night.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:34
verses.text: These chief fathers of the Levites were chief throughout their generations; these dwelt at Jerusalem.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:35
verses.text: And in Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon, Jehiel, whose wife’s name was Maachah:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:36
verses.text: And his firstborn son Abdon, then Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Ner, and Nadab,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:37
verses.text: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zechariah, and Mikloth.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 9:38
verses.text: And Mikloth begat Shimeam. And they also dwelt with their brethren at Jerusalem, over against their brethren.
